title: Summer is ending!
posting_body: Use this link for more info:
WELCOME HOME TO BRIDGE SQUARE APARTMENTS
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 615 Sq.
Your search has led you to the right place!
Welcome home to Bridge Square Apartments.
Unrivaled quality, endless comforts, and gracious apartment living is what you'll find at Bridge Square Apartments.
Our creatively designed floor plans offer the perfect blend of modern architectural design, great amenities, and charming interiors that will delight you.
Our amenities include an all electric gourmet kitchen with a pantry, plush wall to wall carpeting, vertical blinds, spacious closets, and so much more!
Bridge Square Apartments offers so many conveniences for you at an affordable price.
Come relax in our beautiful pool after a long day.
We offer laundry facilities in each building, as well as a playground and picnic area for your enjoyment.
Call us today to schedule an appointment to tour your new home today!
$4.95 Convenience Fee Charged by Online Processor (per transaction)
One application fee per applicant 18 or older.
Application process includes credit, income, and criminal background check.
2.5x Monthly Rent In Household Gross Monthly Income
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
